Comments: Book this room for 3 night. What a awesome place i get. Close to everywhere. Very clean room. Is not wasting your money and time if you booked this axon

Great location to stay as the streets surrounding the building are quite lively & safe + close to the main road to Bukit Bintang so it is a quick walk to the main shopping malls & restaurants.

The room was clean and cozy which is not to what I expected when I read some of the negative reviews below. But I do agree the check-in process needs some improvement.

Overall, still a great place to stay if you are travelling in a group or as couples. Would stay here again in the future.
Very  good hotel & clean & awesome roof & nice stuff especially qasim was very helpful and professional man

Everything is super good. Highly recomended than the legend hotel in front of this unit. Unit is so homey, clean, new and the facilities are complete. Maybe some kitchen tools like knive, glass towel and spatula are usefull.  Clothes hanger are needed too. Thankyou..
Had a safe & happy stay.  Prepare 300RM deposit ahead of time. The place is quite small. Great view

Everything is super good. Highly recomended than the legend hotel in front of this unit. Unit is so homey, clean, new and the facilities are complete. Maybe some kitchen tools like knive, glass towel and spatula are usefull.  Clothes hanger are needed too. Thankyou..
Had a safe & happy stay.  Prepare 300RM deposit ahead of time. The place is quite small. Great view

Name_Reviewer: Olivia from Hong Kong SAR, China
Comments: This apartment aka hotel is very clean, new, AC is cold, water heater is great, not noisy, lift is fast and the view is AMAZING must go to 37 floor.  Location is near to Sungei Wang and Giant supermarket. All good except no fridge, lobby is always busy full of people keep on eye of your belongings and no toothbrush. Qasim as a key owner is very fast to respond my messages. Very good service. I will book again if price still reasonable.
Tempat bersih dan rapi. Yg anter key jg gesit dan helpfull bgt. Cm disana harus bw sikat gigi sdr krn service apartment. Untuk handuk tersedia.

Staff named Qasim is helpfull and fast respond ..
the rooms is clean and have a good view .. 

will back to stay here
It’s a new accommodation with a good rate. My family enjoyed the holiday

Dekat dengan pavillion. Lot 10
Apartment bagus very recommended

Great and clean rooms! Love the concept and layout. Very cozy. However be aware of the very strong sewage smell even after spraying air fresherner.  Check in procedure is a lil hassle. Not your usual Check in at lobby. Have to wait for agent to bring us Check in.

Keselurah sudah hampir baik, hanya saja beberapa detail fasilitas yg belum terpenuhi, seperti peralatan memasak yang belum lengkap, handuk hanya 3 untuk tamu 5 orang, air hangat, lobby yang bau, dan kondisi lift pada saat jam sibuk
I had a great time
The best hotel
QASIM has been very responsive in my enquiries before, during and even after we checked out. He has always remain contactable during our stay and able to attend to us. Location is good as well
Very nice property Signature suit good for group and family

The room is nicely maintained, neat, and clean. But the lobby is very hot and smelly.

We only received the check-in details on the day we reached, and no one contacted us until we called the owner. No parking slot was provided.

Overall is good, within walking distance of the malls and public transport.
Dapat kamar yang الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ bagus bersih
Very very very recommended

once landed - Qasim , tha axon staff already text me , check my arrival time - he did grret me at axon lobby 

Qasim take me to room and brief all sort thing about the room , very friendly guy with good english

the room are good - bath room are good , aircon is good - the location are excelent- behind fahrenheit and opposite sungai wang plaza
Drinking water not provided and there is no minibar in the room.
Not bad but instructions to get room no can be clearer
Great stay... near everything.  Worth it
Walking distance KL Golden triangle area, ample parking lots. Great city view, good facilities likes gym, swimming pool and jogging track
It's a cozy and comfortable place to stay.the area near shopping centre and easy to access

Honestly the location is superb and the building is new.

We stayed for 3 nights and no room services and housekeeping during stay. Only provide 1 towel for each guest and shower gel and shampoo. 

The towel has bad odor 😩.  If you are lucky can get a good one

Guest house lobby and lift packed with guests most all the time. 

The representative  promised to provide house keeping but never delivered.
Nice place and recommended for a family to have a holiday in bukitbintang
Average is good

its a value for money for my trip, excellent room with dining table, small kitchen facilities and a washing machine was there,  it was a 2 bed room suits. enjoyed a lot, service from Quasim & Hasan was excellent, they actually maintain the guest services there
Lokasi sangat strategis, staff nya ramah dan good respon, good view. Next time holiday ke KL bakal tinggal disini lagi. Thankyou Mr. Qasim for your amazing hospitality😍🙏🏻
Excellent
Good
The host is very friendly and helpful.  Good place to stay.
Qasim is very helpfull person from beginning until the end
Qasim is very helpful person
The staff qasim is friendly and helpful. Thank you and will come back again 😊
The staff qasim is friendly and helpful. Thank you and will come back again 😊
The place not bad just neighbourhood too noisy and kids screaming night time
Not very good
Nice & clean place!!
Great view, pool, location
Good location.  Nice place and clean as it is new. Qasim was nice and assisted in smooth check in process.

Location is top notch. There is a 24hr nasi lemak shop just in the front, the name is Kak Maria. They serve the best food 10 out of 10! Also there is a 7Eleven just accross the street. Within 2-5minutes walk, you can find Plaza Sungei Wang, I Setan Japan Store, KL Pavillion Mal. Alor street is also not that far, only 10mins walk.

Room is clean and the view is superb. I got the 33rd floor and I can see from my window KL Tower and Petronas at the same time!

Check in was a bit late though, since the staffs were quite buisy with other guests. I waited for 20minutes to get into my room. But thats not a big deal really. Overall my stay was great.

The location was excellent and the room amenities was great. However, we had a problem with the staff who demanded extra fees for late check in which it did not state on the booking. His reply to the question was rather rude as he told us to go find another accommodation instead at 1 am in the morning when we arrived in Kuala Lumpur. We understand their situation as they dont get paid for working over 12 am. However, we only wished it was stated so we can prepare cash/ change our flight to an earlier time.
Qasim is very helpful from the very beginning... enjoyed my stay there.. on the 43rd floor, we gain a very nice view of the city... will definitely book this place for our future stay...

The view from level 35 is really nice. I love it. Qasim is friendly and helpful. Looking forward staying here in future. Near with 2 big shopping mall trx and time square. Room is very secure. Worth every penny 🤑😍

This is not a hotel or a serviced apartment but rather a room within. residential apartment complex with a lot of them being Airbnb'd out. So there is no check in service, room service, cleaning etc. However we did get a man who must've been working for the owner who was really helpful (shoutout to Azim). Centrally located and right near the main shopping drag and a major train station. the room is small but its all you need

I would highly recommend the area, as there are a lot of nearby restaurants/bars. The unit I got was tidy, but very dusty, and the worst part is the water heater where it wasn’t working! The lobby area and inside the elevators were very warm, as there were no AC turned on.

Location is about the only good thing about Axon. Check in and out process is chaotic and.. casual; some dude rocks up and claims to be the guy helping you with check in, collects 300 RM deposit in cash with a WhatsApp photo as proof of receipt that’s it. Room is frill-less (w a decent view).  It’s strange because while I’d describe it as minimal amenities, on the other hand there were like 3 kettles to be found. No concierge save for 2 security guards who got us to fill up a registration form and took a photo of our passports. No cleaning services provided for our 2 nights stay.

This is by far the worst place that i had stayed for my holiday. No receptionist, only security at the counter whom are not helpful at all! U have to contact the agent via agoda and get them to come over to assist with the check-in.  Same goes to check out and the agent let us waited for quite some time. Luckily we did not place any deposit and therefore we just leave the room card on the table and left without waiting any further. No amenities at all except for shower gel and shampoo only. Our first and last time and for sure not going to come back here  anymore!

-check in took 3hrs and there’s no proper reception, few indian men walking ard checking in random ppl
-rooms were dirty, bedsheets were not changed, towels were wet and used, food crumbs all over the floor, aircon was leaking
-elevator takes forever and it’s always full
Very very disappointing experience and AVOID this place if you can

It's a residence with certain rooms for tourists. 1 ten feet reception table but only security sitting there. Staff without uniform using a writing board to check in.  and collect RM300 deposit with no receipt, only take photo.  no concierge to keep luggage.  Can imagine how messy it was during check in and check out time.  When come to Check-out, it is the worst. need to call the staff to come over from don't know where to return deposit. waited 20 minutes. No amenities at all except liquid hand soap, shower gel and shampoo. No bottle water. No daily cleaning and tidy up of room and change towel. You will regret if you stay here. Lastly, the price is same as the nearby proper hotel.
No p,ace to keep luggage, better stay at hotel, security is so rude, no staff helping

Room_Type: Deluxe Two-Bedroom Suite with City View
Comments: The location is good which is walking distance to bukit bintang area..no free parking and you need to pay RM20 per night for the access card  (it added up the cost of stay which personally think not worth) the room overall is clean but only provide one roll toilet paper..long waiting time at lift especially during noon time..don’t like the most is you have to personally contact the owner at WhatsApp for check in details and meet the staff at lobby for check in and pay additional deposit RM300..and you need to inform your time to meet again when check out to return the key and get back the deposit..hopefully they can provide a better check in and out method..

Good: Great location! The swimming pool had a really nice view. Sound-proofed room.  Provided toiletries. 
Bad: Quite complicated check in process. On top of that the  staff member at check in was quite unwelcoming. Would be helpful if the staff had some sort of authorization.  No fridge in the room. 

To summarize, we had a great stay.
Dirty, no amenities, horrible host, horrible bedsheets.  The location is the only this worth it, everything else was horrible. Please don’t book this accommodation, you will regret it.

Hotel is good but toilets amenities not provided. 
Coffee and tea and mineral water not provided as complementary. We paid higher cost.
Air conditioning not cooling.
Location near Bukit Bintang & Mall , Apartment Very New Design

The service need to be more polite n friendly. Then the guide need to be informed clearly and properly. It's hard for me when we come the place, we don't know who n where to inform our booking. People will assume just like a scam. But everything going well.

My 5days 4nights stayed here is great. Location also superb near with all the malls. We rent 2 bedroom apartments and the safety really okay with all the password door and scanning card through the lift. Mr Qasim was a nice person, very responsive with all my text even at night. Looking forward to stay here again. Thank you Axon.
Qassim is nice and accomodating.
Super convenient location, easy to travel everywhere. Just the lobby is very warm and smelly, there is not air conditional in the lobby. very hot and smelly.  The rest is good

The rooms are nicely maintained and the location is superb for all visitors to KL. Especially in walking distance to TRX and Pavillion.

Special mentioned to Inshallah who provided excellent service throughout the stay. They also provide turnover service on 3rd day on my stay at no charges.

Checked in late due to our flight arrived at 11pm at KLIA which meant that we only arrived at the apartment at 12.40am.  Due to this the host asked for additional RM50 saying that this is due to him having to wait till past midnight. We did not expect this at all. No receipt was given either for this additional RM50. There is also a language barrier, host is not able to speak fluently in English nor Malay which make it difficult to communicate properly. We booked for a 3 bedroom apartment. The apartment is smaller than we expected as the 3rd bedroom only have 1 single bed. We asked for an additional mattress, the host did not want to entertain us right away by giving us the reason that it is already pass midnight and that he want to go home and sleep. Next day, we got the extra mattress but with additional charges, again without giving receipt. Would be better if this apartment have a proper reception with proper professionals handling guests rather than the way it is handled at the moment as it made us felt unsecure. Apartment is newly built but unfortunately, lobby smells bad. Location is good. No microwave, would be better if it has one. Only shampoo & body wash provided, no other toiletries.

Nice place to stay but the enrolment and checking in/out handle by Security guard and representatives foreigner not that efficient. Slightly rough way and communication breakdown in term of speaking language. Especially dealing via whatapps and lapse of customers service oriented.

The Towels Smells Bad. The Key card makes unconfortable to in and out. The key card should be tap in 5 Spots. The next room sounds realy loud that sometimes wakes my sleep. Door spankings sound So loud. This unit only for viral view of the infinity pool not for Comfortable stays. The Good things are the locationa near Pavilions and plaza sungai wang and mini markets and restaurants around this unit.
Closer location to shopping mall but no luggage storage after check out. recommended to have that services. No fridge also.

The location is great and within walking distance of a number of shops and the Petronas Towers. The place is really clean and worth the money. However, the check in and check out process ruined things for me. It needs serious improvement. There isn't a front desk attending and you have to wait for an individual to show up to give you your keys and deposit back. Unclear check in instructions were provided to me. It's inconvenient that your check out time can be delayed or affected because the attendant who has your funds slept late the night before and you have to wait for them to show up with your money. It would be great if they could have a cardless check in and check out process. I personally wouldn't return simply because of this process.
Easy to check in. No response when message via Agoda/e-mail but promptly replied to message when using whatsapp at provided phone number
Close to small shops where you can get ur daily needs and a short walk to pavillion. Staff are very helpful. Wish they provide breakfast too. For groups like us who dont bother to cook on holidays. 😃
Thankyou so much for always for us when we needed. Ur service is tip top. InshaAllah i'll repeat to stay there.
Good choice, convenience
Very good location.
Worth for Money , convinience for those who love area at bukit bintang it just a walk away to the nearest store, like pavilion, lot 10, Sg.Wang and many mores

The towel was moldy and only 1 towel. Wasnt really much amenities. Shower in the bathroom was overflowing when taking shower.
Location is really convenient. The superior room is tiny, so wasnt a comfy stay overall.
The room was so dirty includes all the pillow and the sheet. Noisy environment. Not recommended. My first time and also my last time to be here

We parked our car less than 24 hours in the hotel premises, but it charged us RM50 for such enormous fees! Worst thing is, we have no clear instruction how to redeem it from the counter as it was fully packed with travelers. Please Avoid AXON, but go for SLEEPING LION will be much organize.
Too many people but can't afford the lift capacity
Poor management

Book via Agoda and thought it’s a hotel stay and end up it’s Airbnb condo stay. No reception for handover. Carpark arrangement is terrible and instruction not clear. 
Check in and there is no fridge, mini bar and no access card to enter unit. Have to use door PIN code.  
Dual key design unit, next door unit kids making alot of noise in the night and sound proofing is bad. Wifi signal is bad too. 
Worst home stay even and this platform should be removed from Agoda

Pros
1. The Pavilion shopping mall is only 3 minutes from the building
2. MRT and sky rail stations are close by
3. Gym & infinity pool are good
Cons
1. No daily cleaning
2. Dusts and hairs are on the room floor and furnitures
3. Two towels for 6 nights stay
4. Elevators are very slow
TQ Qasim for the help on the hospitality. The location is great.
The room itself is nice n cozy. Very convenient location. MRT station is just abt8-10mins walk away. You find everything, from dining to shopping, everything is just minutes walk away.
Love the location which very near to Pavilion and the place is nice and clean

Bon établissement à savoir que ce n’est pas un hôtel mais des appartements de type airbnb
Mais plutôt sympa

Bonjour,

Nous avons réservé dans cette hôtel qui ne ai pas un ! On a eu des souci car le chambre était vraiment petite pour un 25 m2 pour nous c’était à peine 15m2 
Pour 2 personnes c’était pas possible de séjourner on pouvait même pas ouvrir nos valise ! Nous avons essayé de voir avec le vendeur de nous changer de chambre il n’a pas vou et avons donc contacté Agoda pour trouver une solution ! 
Ils nous ont laisser en galère à l’autre bout du monde sans logement et a préféré croire les dires du vendeur que des nôtres . Bons avons du donc réserver dans un autre hôtel à nos frais car Agoda a refusé de nous rembourser ou de nous reloger ! Je recommande vraiment pas

La résidence est belle avec une magnifique piscine a débordement au 33éme étage. Chambre petite mais correcte. Par contre aucun service . Un gardien a l'entrée  qui se fout de vous comme de sa première chemise. Une autre personne au bout d'une demi heure d'attente qui vient vous montrer la chambre et vous donnez le badge d'ouverture et vous  réclame 300 riggits de caution ensuite vous ne le voyez plus jusqu'à check out. Il vous prends le badge fait demi tour sans une parole. Je ne recommande pas cet établissement.

After a wonderful trip through Malaysia, I ended up saying goodbye in an Arab bazaar. The reception staff wear military uniforms and military boots. you are not welcomed as a woman. as a woman you will be overlooked. Then suddenly a little Arab sneaks up from the side and says without any greeting: Show me your booking! and taps around on your iPhone. Incredible!! something like that in 2024! Totally disrespectful, I'm almost twice his age. The room has no amenities other than a TV and air conditioning, no hairdryer, no reading lights on the bed, no kettle. The area is central, but as a woman you don't want to walk around alone. Surrounding the apartment are run-down apartment blocks with bare-chested men staring at tourists from their balconies. When you meet these poor people on the street, they check everything about you. The streets are full of garbage and rats. I can't understand the reviews on Agoda and would advise women not to book there.
Axon is just 5 Min away from the pavillon, suite is equipped with washing machine , our host Qasim is very friendly and professional.

基本的には想像通りの良いホテル？でした。
ただ、システム的にはこれは民泊に近い感じで、部屋のオーナーの鍵を借りて素泊まりというシステムのようです。
そのため、ホテルのようなチェックインカウンターはなく、一人だけ制服を着た常駐スタッフに予約ナンバーを告げます。
また、それから私服の仲介らしき人に再度予約ナンバーを告げカードキーなどを受け取るという初見ではかなりややこしいシステムです。
ただ、それさえ理解してホテルのようなきめ細やかなサービスを期待しなければ問題はありません。
荷物預かりのサービスがあるということでホテルではなくてもいいかということで選んだが結局預かってもらえなかった。あとお金はカードで払ってあったがデポジットを300リンギット要求されたのでびっくり！最初から書いておいて欲しかった。どこかに書いてあったのかな？！鍵もなかなか難しかった。

Spent 4 nights here for KL. 
Location is more than great. Less than 5 min walk to LOT 10 and Star Hill,  easy access to Pavilion and KLCC.
Room is clean with modern design, equipped with wash machine etc.

Overall was good, refurbishment seems new. However, 2 large cockroaches were in the bathroom early in the morning! Only 1 roll of toilet paper were provided for 3 adults and replenished only late in the evening! The corridor and life have no ventilation at all, and filled with strong smell fr the Indian shop cooking nearby. Ventilation definitely needs urgent improvement.

Name_Reviewer: MEI from Hong Kong SAR, China
Comments:
He said if we don't pay, we can't move in.
極差的遭遇！不停要求我們支付300馬元作押金，但不出具收據。并威脅 不給我們入住。
房间非常小，而且酒店的管理非常乱，接待的是一些外劳，沟通难，deposit没有收据，而且因为使用的是银行转账，退房直接要自己把钥匙放到邮箱后，要一直自己去催退回deposit，并不是马上退回，地理位置是属于后面一些，不是特别理想有更好的选择，门卡有问题，一直刷不到开楼层的门。房间只有吹风筒，烫斗还有一个烧水壶，毛巾，沐浴露是加水了的非常稀，洗发水非常廉价的。没有冰箱，洗漱用品，矿泉水等。

직원도 친절하나

티슈등 실내 비품이 없고 실내화가 없는 것이 단점

1.The environment smells strange 2.check in Service very bad 3.The first reservation was also my last visit  4.lift very slow 5.Unable to communicate with staff 6.There are also socks left by the previous tenant in the room

This place really sucks. Staff are super rude, the beds and bedding are disgusting, and I won't even mention how terrible the bathroom was. God have mercy on your soul if you book here. You might survive one night but you will probably regret it.
Almost as all the suites in KL

The location for this suites is nice but there are a lot of foreign workers here. And the suites has smoke smells even though it is a non smoking suites. The suites is dirty and the blanket is dirty. The System to check in is not perfect, we only lead by a foreign worker to our suites.

Axon is easy to find, having best view and facilities. No complaint about it and definetely will come back. Affordable, best location, and very informatif also super kind staff not forget to name it. Awesome
Lobby smelly. Host rude, give bad information
There is no microwave and iron
There is no microwave and iron

Checking into this place feels like entering a military base. There is no reception staff; the check in is processed by an unfriendly-looking security guard and your room details will be given via Whatsapp from a so-called agent who does not speak English clearly nor does he speak Malaysian. The lift waiting times are atrocious given that none but one of the lifts actually lead to the guest room; ths rest only going to parking areas and other amenities such ad the swimmimg pool. This is nothing more than a glorified Airbnb with very poor customer service; will be avoiding this place in the future. Do not be fooled by their self-proclaimed 5 star rating.
booking buat ber 5 tapi tempat tidur buat ber 3, lalu jorok dan handuk di suruh tunggu besok pagi, jadi semalaman gak usah mandi. parah

It's actually a strategic place to stay in KL. You can reach Sunge Wang plaza, Pavillion Mall, Lot 10 and Alor street just by walk 5-10 minutes. The staff, named Qasim was so helpfull and kind. Kinda back here if we came tp KL in the next time.
Pertama kali menginap disini. Kami check in terlambat, jam 2 pagi (2am). Kami dibantu staff yg ramah, Mr Hasan. Next time I will come again.
sangat bagus ketika saya menginap bersama keluarga di KL, pengurus yang bernama Qasim sangat baik dan jelas ketika mengarahkan 👍🏼
Lokasi bagus
Hotel yg oaling ga bagus pelayanan nya  dan saya tidak akan pernah mau kembali lagi ke hotel ini
Good Place and near from mall and public transportation,, nice service from Qosim
سيئ
Mọi thứ thật tuyệt vời. Người dân ở đây thân thiện và đi lại rất gần TTTM
Nếu có đi lần sau sẽ book khách sạn khác
Sảnh lễ tân hơi tạp nham và nhiều người có mùi, có phòng ko có wifi, điều hoà ko đủ mát.
Sảnh k sạch sẽ, mùi cơ thế
Alt er bra. Litt forvirrende ved innsjekk
J
sangattt baguss tmpatnya dan deket pavillion
Very bad experience with me staff.
The location is the mail selling point and also the facilities is wonderful! Infinity pool and also 5 min walking to PAVILION and also Jalan alor will book again thank you so much host
Terrible lift waiting time. going up and down  from our room.
No complimentary drink, room slippers and coffee provided as per my last stay. Not sure if luna suite same as signature suite which i had chosen earlier.

Checking in was messy   We travelled as a group n there was inconsistency   My check in coordinator asked us to pay for the parking pass whilst my other travelling companions did not have to   Another wanted a security deposit for the room   Had to Q for the elevator at peak hours!!   Room was very bare and the blankets had a smell    Only good thing was the good view as we were on a high floor   Would not stay there again ever!!
